title: Boat ownership by age in the U.S. 2013
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories for the x axis representing Age (in years), and a y axis representing Own a boat.
The highest category is found at 16_to_34 where Own a boat is 8.2.
The lowest category is found at 65+ where Own a boat is 6.0.
gold: The statistic depicts the boat ownership rate by age in the U.S. in 2013 . 7.5 percent of the respondents aged 45 to 64 years own a boat .
